generations.content_context: January 12 was characterized by focus on infrastructure reliability and decentralized scaling, highlighted by the planned Jeju network launch and performance gains of 40% in runtime initialization. generations.content_context: Enterprise CIOs are resistant to agent-driven code replacement due to risk aversion, shifting focus toward decentralized individual users. Dev team clarified that runtime overhead (Node vs Rust) is negligible compared to network and database latency.
